name: Dice Skater
overview: Dice Skater is an action game with puzzle elements. You play a little guy on a single dice (or an average sized guy on a gigantic oversized disc, depending on your perspective). The goal is to color in all the dots on the dice. There is also a little dot that follows you around that you have to avoid. The game was developed by Geir Straume with music by Sean Connolly and released as part of the RGCD C64 16KB Cartridge Game Development Competition 2019
